page.title: 02 LIVING BY THE RIVER MEDWAY
page.content: It is nice to be living near the {River Medway}because there are lots of things you can see and learn. Near the locks is the{Malta Inn}which is also a reastaurant. Opposite the Malta Inn is {Allington Castle.}The{locks}along the river still work and next to them is the sluice gate for the locks which is run on electric power. Most people on a weekend go along the river in their boats and adults and children go fishing.The river looks dirty, but it is mostly mud as there are few factories here now.You can get to the other side of the river by the bridge next to the sluice and you walk over the lock. by Darren Attwell
